an10.147:1.1: “I will teach you what is the true teaching and what is not the true teaching. …
an10.147:1.3: And what is not the true teaching?
an10.147:1.4: Wrong view, wrong thought, wrong speech, wrong action, wrong livelihood, wrong effort, wrong mindfulness, wrong immersion, wrong knowledge, and wrong freedom.
an10.147:1.5: This is called what is not the true teaching.
an10.147:1.6: And what is the true teaching?
an10.147:1.7: Right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, right immersion, right knowledge, and right freedom.
an10.147:1.8: This is called the true teaching.”
